sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Apache package provides ab, apachectl, apr-config, apu-config, apxs, checkgid, dbmmanage, htdbm, htdigest, htpasswd, httpd, logresolve, rotatelogs, libapr, libaprutil and various modules.

sect3.title: ab
sect3.para: ab is a tool for benchmarking your Apache HTTP server.

sect3.title: apachectl
sect3.para: apachectl is a frontend to the Apache HTTP server which is designed to help the administrator control the functioning of the Apache httpd daemon.

sect3.title: apxs
sect3.para: apxs is a tool for building and installing extension modules for the Apache HTTP server.

sect3.title: dbmmanage
sect3.para: dbmmanage is used to create and update the DBM format files used to store usernames and password for basic authentication of HTTP users.

sect3.title: htdigest
sect3.para: htdigest is used to create and update the flat-files used to store usernames, realm and password for digest authentication of HTTP users.

sect3.title: htpasswd
sect3.para: htpasswd is used to create and update the flat-files used to store usernames and password for basic authentication of HTTP users.

sect3.title: httpd
sect3.para: httpd is the Apache HTTP server program.

sect3.title: logresolve
sect3.para: logresolve is a post-processing program to resolve IP-addresses in Apache's access logfiles.

sect3.title: rotatelogs
sect3.para: rotatelogs is a simple program for use in conjunction with Apache's piped logfile feature.
